document_data.name: Melody Mount Walk
document_data.mainbody:
'''Melody Mount Walk''' was a magically lit tunnel in the [[Castle Ward of Waterdeep|Castle Ward]] of [[Waterdeep]] that ran west up to the cliffs on which the [[New Olamn]] barding college was situated. The tunnel contained a little-known portal between Waterdeep and the keep in [[Rassalantar]].

The tunnel was continuously resounding with music due to an ongoing concert known as the [[Neverending String of Pearls]] that was performed by [[bard]]ic students from New Olamn in a small alcove in the tunnel.
